name: Ephemery
description: A temporary, secure, and private text sharing utility
author: Adam Wilson <adam@bastion.dev>

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && yarn && yarn run build && find ./build -type f -name '*.js' -exec gzip -k '{}' \;  && find ./build -type f -name '*.css' -exec gzip -k '{}' \;
